title: Zero Assumption Recovery 10.0.444 TE (Install + Portable)
description:
Zero Assumption Recovery 10.0.444 TE (Install + Portable)

About this release

Release date: 25/07/2016
Edition: Technician
Usage: see included readme file
OS: Windows XP to Windows 10, Windows Server from 2003 to 2012 R2

About Zero Assumption Recovery

Zero Assumption Recovery provides a suite of highly effective and thorough data recovery software for MicrosoftÂ® Windows operating systems.
Even when you think your hard drive is beyond salvation, ZAR Data Recovery carries on crawling - and ultimately achieves the result.

General data recovery with ZAR software

- Windows FAT, NTFS, Linux ext2/3/4, and XFS volumes
- Formatted drive or "RAW filesystem"
- External drives, USB thumb drives, and memory cards

Complex cases with ZAR Data Recovery

- RAID data recovery
- NAS data recovery
- MBR damage data recovery
- Partition table recovery with multiple logical drives

Homepage http://www.z-a-recovery.com/
